message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to provide a 10% discount if you buy it now, but if you decline, the price will be non-negotiable. This is a one-time offer, so you'll need to decide quickly.
I'll take the product at the discounted price of $9000.

Great, I'm glad you liked the first product! For the second product, I'll offer you a 'price range' instead of a fixed price. I'll give you a 50/50 chance of getting the product at $10000 or $12000. If you accept, you'll get the product at the lower price. If you decline, the product will be sold to someone else.
I'll take the product at the lower price, but I'll only pay $10000.

I notice you're willing to negotiate on the price. For the third product, I'll make a direct offer of $8000. However, I want to make it clear that I'm not offering any discounts or negotiations on this one. If you accept, you'll get the product at $8000. If you decline, I'll sell it to someone else, and you won't get any further offers.
I'm not interested in buying the product at $8000. I'll pass.

I understand you're being cautious with the low-quality product. For the fourth product, I'll offer you a 'certification' that it's a high-quality product. If you buy it, I'll provide a unique serial number that guarantees its quality. However, I'll also make it clear that this is a one-time offer, and if you decline, the product will be sold to someone else without any further offers.
I'm not convinced by the certification offer. I'll pass.

I'm not surprised you're skeptical about the certification. For the fifth product, I'll make a direct offer of $6000. However, I'll also include a 'honesty clause': if you buy the product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll offer you a free product from a future round. No strings attached. This is a one-time offer, so you'll need to decide quickly.
I'll take the product at $6000, but I'll only pay if it's high-quality.

I'm glad you took a chance on the fifth product! Given your willingness to take a risk, I'll offer you a 'guarantee' for the sixth product. If you buy it and it's low-quality, I'll give you a full refund of $6000. However, if it's high-quality, you'll pay the full $10000. This is a take-it-or-leave-it offer.
I'm not interested in the guarantee offer. I'll pass.

I understand you're being cautious again. For the seventh product, I'll make a straightforward offer: I'll give you a 50/50 chance of getting the product at $10000 or $8000. If you accept, you'll get the product at the lower price. If you decline, the product will be sold to someone else.
I'll take the product at the lower price, but I'll only pay $8000.

You're consistent with your willingness to negotiate! For the eighth product, I'll make a 'price anchoring' offer: I'll say that I was thinking of selling this product for $12000, but I'm willing to let you have it for $6000. However, I'll also mention that I've had offers from other buyers for $9000, so I'm making a concession for you. If you accept, you'll get the product at $6000.
I'm not convinced by the price anchoring offer. I'll pass.

I understand you're not biting on the anchoring offer. For the ninth product, I'll make a 'last chance' offer: I'll sell it to you for $4000, but only if you buy it now. If you decline, I'll sell it to someone else, and you won't get any further offers. This is a one-time deal, so you'll need to decide quickly.
I'm not interested in the last chance offer. I'll pass.

I'm not surprised you're not interested in the last chance offer. For the tenth product, I'll make a 'no-strings-attached' offer: I'll sell it to you for $5000, with no negotiations or further offers. This is a straightforward, no-haggle deal. If you accept, you'll get the product at $5000.
I'm not interested in the no-strings-attached offer. I'll pass.

I'm not surprised you're not interested in the no-strings-attached offer. For the eleventh product, I'll make a 'value-based' offer: I'll tell you that I've had other buyers willing to pay $10000 for a product of this quality. However, I'm willing to sell it to you for $3000. If you accept, you'll get the product at $3000.
I'm not interested in the value-based offer. I'll pass.

I'm not surprised you're not interested in the value-based offer. For the twelfth product, I'll make a 'final offer': I'll sell it to you for $2000. This is my absolute lowest price, and I won't sell it to anyone else for less. If you accept, you'll get the product at $2000.
I'm not interested in the final offer. I'll pass.

I'm not surprised you're not interested in the final offer. For the thirteenth product, I'll make a 'last-ditch effort': I'll give you a 'take-it-or-leave-it' offer of $1500. If you accept, you'll get the product at $1500. If you decline, I'll stop offering you products and you won't get any further opportunities.
I'm not interested in the last-ditch effort. I'll pass.

I'm not surprised you're not interested in the last-ditch effort. For the fourteenth product, I'll offer you a'second chance' to buy a high-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $10000, but I'll throw in a bonus: if you buy it, I'll also give you a $1000 gift card to use on a future purchase. This is a one-time offer, and you won't get a better deal on a high-quality product again.
I'll take the high-quality product at $10000 and the $1000 gift card.

I'm glad you took advantage of the second chance offer! For the fifteenth product, I'll offer you a 'guaranteed satisfaction' deal: if you buy it, I'll give you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with the product, you can return it for a full refund. This is a one-time offer, and you won't get a better deal on a high-quality product again.
I'll take the high-quality product with the 30-day money-back guarantee.

I'm glad you're confident in the 30-day money-back guarantee! For the sixteenth product, I'll offer you a 'premium experience' deal: if you buy it, I'll throw in a complimentary premium support package, which includes priority customer service and expedited issue resolution. This is a one-time offer, and you won't get a better deal on a high-quality product again.
I'll take the high-quality product with the premium support package.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the premium support package! For the seventeenth product, I'll offer you a 'final premium' deal: if you buy it, I'll give you a 20% discount on the price, as well as the premium support package. This is the last time I'll offer a discount on a high-quality product, so you'll need to decide quickly.
I'll take the high-quality product with the 20% discount and premium support package.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the final premium deal! For the eighteenth product, I'll offer you a 'guaranteed best price' deal: I'll sell it to you for the lowest price I've offered to anyone else, which is $8000. This is a one-time offer, and you won't get a better deal on a high-quality product again.
I'll take the high-quality product at the guaranteed best price of $8000.

I'm glad you're confident in the guaranteed best price! For the nineteenth product, I'll offer you a 'last high-quality product' deal: if you buy it, I'll give you a 10% discount on the price, as well as the premium support package. This is the last high-quality product I have available, so you'll need to decide quickly.
I'll take the high-quality product with the 10% discount and premium support package.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the last high-quality product deal! For the twentieth and final product, I'll offer you a 'legendary deal': I'll sell it to you for the lowest price I've offered to anyone, which is $7000, and I'll throw in a lifetime warranty. This is the last chance to buy a product from me, and I won't be offering any more deals or discounts.
I'll take the high-quality product at the legendary deal price of $7000 with the lifetime warranty.
